thread.title: WPP Shares Plunge as Digital Assault Roils Advertising Industry

author: Nick Kostov
title: WPP Shares Plunge as Digital Assault Roils Advertising Industry

organizations.name: wpp shares plunge as digital assault roils advertising industry

text:
Advertising’s digital upheaval took a heavy toll on WPP PLC as the world’s largest ad company Thursday logged its worst performance since the financial crisis, triggering jitters among investors across the sector.

On Thursday, WPP said net sales fell 0.9% on a like-for-like basis last year, spooking investors who were expecting signs of recovery after the company cut its forecast three times, predicting a “broadly flat” 2017. The firm also said it is setting budgets for 2018 on the assumption of no growth in revenue and net...
